title: Routing Control (DRA) 3G/4G - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
text: Routing Control  Diameter Routing Agent (DRA)  is a function in a 3G or 4G network which provides real-time routing capabilities to ensure that diameter messages are routed among the correct elements in a network. DRA can act as: Relay agent: supports basic Diameter message forwarding with no message modification or inspection function. Proxy agent: supports the ability to inspect and modify Diameter messages. This Right to Use (RTU) grants the licensee the right to use DigitalRoutes MediationZone software in accordance with this definition.
